atk-abh03a19:2_1: Idāni gihissa arahāti kathā nāma hoti.
atk-abh03a19:2_2: Tattha yesaṁ yasakulaputtādīnaṁ gihibyañjane ṭhitānaṁ arahattappattiṁ disvā “gihi assa arahā”ti laddhi,
atk-abh03a19:2_7: Paravādī pana adhippāyaṁ asallakkhetvā gihibyañjanamattameva passanto paṭijānāti.
atk-abh03a19:6_0: So brāhmaṇo so samaṇo sa bhikkhū”’ti. ;
atk-abh03a19:7_0: Imaṁ nayaṁ dassetuṁ atthi arahatotiādi āraddhaṁ. Taṁ sabbaṁ uttānatthamevāti.
atk-abh03a19:10_2: Tattha yesaṁ “opapātiko hoti tatthaparinibbāyī”tivacanāni ayoniso gahetvā suddhāvāsesu upapattiyā arahāti laddhi,
atk-abh03a19:10_3: “yesaṁ vā upahaccaparinibbāyī”ti padaṁ parivattitvā “upapajjaparinibbāyī”ti pariyāpuṇantānaṁ saha upapattiyā arahā hotīti laddhi,
atk-abh03a19:10_10: Tasmāssa imaṁ nayaṁ dassetuṁ saha upapattiyā sotāpannotiādi āraddhaṁ.
atk-abh03a19:11_0: 389.Sāriputtotiādi imesu mahātheresu ko ekopi saha upapattiyā arahā nāmāti codanatthaṁ vuttaṁ.
atk-abh03a19:15_8: kiṁ tassa teyeva uppajjantīti codanatthaṁ maggo phalantiādi āraddhaṁ.
atk-abh03a19:15_9: Cakkhu anāsavanti puṭṭho tassa sāsavattā paṭikkhipati.
atk-abh03a19:16_1: Cīvarapañhe ekova dhammo anāsavo sāsavo ca hotīti lakkhaṇavirodhabhayā paṭikkhipati.
atk-abh03a19:16_2: Dutiyaṁ puṭṭho anāsavassa hutvā sāsavassa hotīti paṭijānāti.
atk-abh03a19:16_4: Sakavādī pana taññevāti anuññātattā “maggo anāsavo hutvā”tiādīhi codeti.
atk-abh03a19:19_2: Tattha dve samannāgamā paccuppannakkhaṇe samaṅgībhāvasamannāgamo ca rūpāvacarādīsu aññatarabhūmippattito paṭilābhasamannāgamo ca.
atk-abh03a19:19_5: Yesaṁ pana ṭhapetvā ime dve samannāgame añño upapattidhammavasena eko samannāgamo nāma hotīti laddhi,
atk-abh03a19:19_7: tesaṁ pattidhammo nāma koci natthīti anubodhanatthaṁ arahā catūhi phalehi samannāgatoti pucchā sakavādissa,
atk-abh03a19:19_9: Athassa “yadi te arahā catūhi khandhehi viya catūhi phalehi samannāgato,
atk-abh03a19:19_10: evaṁ sante ye catūsu phalesu cattāro phassādayo,
atk-abh03a19:19_11: tehi te arahato samannāgatatā pāpuṇātī”ti codanatthaṁ arahā catūhi phassehītiādi āraddhaṁ.
atk-abh03a19:19_12: Taṁ sabbaṁ paravādinā ekakkhaṇe catunnaṁ phassādīnaṁ abhāvā paṭikkhittaṁ.
atk-abh03a19:21_0: 396.Tehi ca aparihīnoti pañhe yasmā yathā paccanīkasamudācārena lokiyajjhānadhammā parihāyanti,
atk-abh03a19:21_4: te tathā pahīnāva tathā paṭippassaddhāyeva ca honti,
atk-abh03a19:21_6: Svāyamattho parato “arahatā cattāro maggā paṭiladdhā”tiādīsu pakāsitoyeva.
atk-abh03a19:24_0: 397.Arahāchahi upekkhāhīti kathāyapi imināva nayena attho veditabbo.
atk-abh03a19:24_1: Arahā hi chasu dvāresu upekkhānaṁ uppattibhabbatāya tāhi samannāgatoti vuccati,
atk-abh03a19:27_3: Tasmā yesaṁ yathā odātena vaṇṇena odāto,
atk-abh03a19:27_7: te sandhāya pucchā ca anuyogo ca sakavādissa,
atk-abh03a19:28_0: Atītāyāti pañhe tasmiṁ khaṇe abhāvato paṭikkhipati.
atk-abh03a19:28_3: Dutiyaṁ puṭṭho yaṁ tena tāya karaṇīyaṁ kataṁ,
atk-abh03a19:28_5: Lesokāsaṁ pana adatvā dukkhaṁ parijānātītiādinā nayena puṭṭho tassa kiccassa abhāvā paṭikkhipati.
atk-abh03a19:29_0: Anāgatapañhe tasmiṁ khaṇe maggañāṇassa abhāvā paṭikkhipati.
atk-abh03a19:29_1: Dutiyaṁ puṭṭho “agamā rājagahaṁ buddho”ti anāgatāya bodhiyā buddhabhāvaṁ maññamāno paṭijānāti.
atk-abh03a19:29_2: Bodhikaraṇīyaṁ karotīti puṭṭho tasmiṁ khaṇe kiccābhāvena paṭikkhipati.
atk-abh03a19:30_1: Tisso bodhiyo ekato katvā puṭṭho sabbaññutaññāṇaṁ sandhāya tīhipi buddhoti vattabbabhāvato paṭijānāti.
atk-abh03a19:30_2: Puna tīhiti puṭṭho sabbāsaṁ ekakkhaṇe abhāvā paṭikkhipati.
atk-abh03a19:30_3: Dutiyaṁ puṭṭho atītānāgatapaccuppannassa sabbaññutaññāṇassa vasena paṭijānāti.
atk-abh03a19:30_4: Puna lesokāsaṁ adatvā satataṁ samitanti puṭṭho paṭikkhipati.
atk-abh03a19:31_2: Nanu bodhipaṭilābhāti pañhe pana yasmiṁ santāne bodhisaṅkhātaṁ maggañāṇaṁ uppannaṁ,
atk-abh03a19:31_4: Tassa adhippāyaṁ ajānitvā hañcīti laddhiṭṭhapanā paravādissa.
atk-abh03a19:31_5: Idānissa asallakkhaṇaṁ pākaṭaṁ kātuṁ bodhipaṭilābhā buddhoti bodhiyā buddhoti pucchā sakavādissa.
atk-abh03a19:31_9: Itaro “bodhipaṭilābho nāma bodhiyā uppajjitvā niruddhāyapi santāne uppannabhāvoyeva.
atk-abh03a19:31_10: Bodhi nāma maggakkhaṇe ñāṇa”nti imaṁ vibhāgaṁ asallakkhentova puna paṭijānāti.
atk-abh03a19:31_11: Tato sakavādinā bodhipaṭilābhā bodhīti puṭṭho vacanokāsaṁ alabhanto paṭikkhipatīti.
atk-abh03a19:35_2: Tattha “yehi samannāgatassa mahāpurisassa dveva gatiyo bhavantī”ti imaṁ suttaṁ ayoniso gahetvā lakkhaṇasamannāgato bodhisattova hotīti yesaṁ laddhi,
atk-abh03a19:36_0: Cakkavattisattoti pañhesu yasmā cakkavattī sattopi ca bodhisattopi,
atk-abh03a19:37_1: So hi pacchime bhave buddho hoti,
atk-abh03a19:40_2: Tattha yesaṁ ghaṭikārasutte jotipālassa pabbajjaṁ sandhāya “bodhisatto kassapabhagavato pāvacane okkantaniyāmo caritabrahmacariyo”ti laddhi,
atk-abh03a19:40_6: Tato yasmā niyāmoti vā brahmacariyanti vā ariyamaggassa nāmaṁ,
atk-abh03a19:40_7: bodhisattānañca ṭhapetvā pāramīpūraṇaṁ aññā niyāmokkanti nāma natthi.
atk-abh03a19:40_11: Kevalañhi naṁ buddhā attano ñāṇabale ṭhatvā –
atk-abh03a19:40_18: Pacchimabhavaṁ sandhāya paṭikkhipitvā jotipālakāle anussavaṁ sandhāya paṭijānāti.
atk-abh03a19:41_2: na itare okkantaniyāmā evarūpā hontī”ti dassetuṁ vuttaṁ.
atk-abh03a19:42_0: Sāvako jātiṁ vītivattoti yāya jātiyā sāvako,
atk-abh03a19:42_1: taṁ vītivatto aññasmiṁ bhave asāvako hotīti pucchati.
atk-abh03a19:45_2: Tattha yesaṁ “catutthamaggaṭṭho puggalo pattidhammavasena tīhi phalehi samannāgato”ti laddhi,
atk-abh03a19:45_6: Sesamettha heṭṭhā catūhi phalehi samannāgatakathāyaṁ vuttanayeneva veditabbanti.
atk-abh03a19:48_6: Puna sabbe saṁyojanāti puṭṭho heṭṭhā vuttamaggattayena pahīne sandhāya paṭikkhipati.
atk-abh03a19:48_7: Dutiyaṁ puṭṭho tena maggena appahīnassa abhāvā paṭijānāti.
